name: Todi - Basic Movement Edition
description:
Todi - Basic Movement Edition

Lizard person Todi, is stuck in hell, help him escape.

(Warning, game is quite difficult to finish)

Controls:

Left and Right Arrow Keys = Left and Right movement (or WallSlide)

Down Arrow Key = Crouch

Space Key = Jump

Hello, I'm trying to make a pixel art game. 

I want to release demos along the way to get feedback. This game I made to test out the basic player movement mechanics, would love to hear any and all feedback.

Enjoy

Special thanks to Tvnami, who did the theme music.

Update 0.1.2

- Fixed issue with being able to jump while in a tunnel
- Added 3 hearts to represent 3 lives
- Added version for Mac (Beware, not fully tested)
